page.title: 09Village Events
page.content: {Village Hall}Built in the 1960's by local people the Hall is the centre for many activities including:_ Sports,Discos,Playgroup and Baby Clinic,Concerts Plays and Pantomime,Domino Drives,Womens' Institute,Craft Club,Senior Citizens' Club,Keep Fit and Football Club Meetings. {Working Mens Club}Sited in an interesting old building which was once the village "lock-up",the Club is a social centre and meeting place.It has a darts team,a domino(fives & threes)team and a quoits team.The club committee run an annual outing to the seaside. {Ancient Unicorn}The village "pub" is an old coaching inn.The stables and coachhouses are now tourist bedrooms. .The pub has a tug_of_war, darts and domino teams in local leagues.
